dropZone: Drop video or image files here

warning.title: ⚠️ Reminder:
warning.suggestion: Please convert the video to one of the following formats:

ffmpegTip.title: Tip: You can use FFmpeg for conversion
ffmpegTip.note: FFmpeg doesn't support WebM to MP4 conversion, please use MP4 to WebM instead.

about.author: Author
about.description: In development... it's hard to develop alone

changelog.fixCopyFilter: ✨ Fix the issue of copying the same video filter settings
changelog.removeDeleteVisualFeedback: 🔧 Remove delete visual feedback to avoid state confusion
changelog.improveDeleteLogic: 🔧 Improve deletion logic to ensure correct target card identification
changelog.addGPUTranscode: 🚀 Add GPU hardware acceleration transcoding support
changelog.addGPUFallback: 🛡️ Add intelligent GPU transcoding fallback mechanism
changelog.fixGPUTranscodeFail: 🐛 Fix large file GPU transcoding failure issue
changelog.addBatchSelection: ☑️ Add batch selection feature for cards
changelog.improveBatchUI: 🎨 Improve batch operation interface and visual feedback
changelog.addScaleInputControl: 🎚️ Add scale input control for precise scaling
changelog.fixScaleSync: 🔄 Fix wheel scaling and input box synchronization
changelog.addCardsDropZone: 📁 Add drag-and-drop file support to Cards window
changelog.addDragDropSupport: 🎯 Support video, image and RAW image drag-and-drop
changelog.fixDropZoneOverlay: 🐛 Fix drop zone overlay blocking title bar issue
changelog.optimizeTranscodeDetection: ⚡ Optimize transcoding detection logic to avoid unnecessary transcoding
changelog.improveFileCompatibility: 🔍 Improve file compatibility detection for better direct playback success rate
changelog.speedupTranscodeCheck: 🚀 Speed up transcoding detection from 5 seconds to 1 second
changelog.fixCardsTranscodeLogic: 🐛 Fix Cards window drag-and-drop transcoding logic issues
changelog.fixCommandLineTranscode: 🔧 Fix right-click file open not triggering transcode detection
changelog.unifyRegistryGUID: 🔑 Unify registry GUID to resolve multi-version conflicts
changelog.addRegistryCleanup: 🧹 Add registry cleanup tool and troubleshooting documentation
changelog.fixBatchDeleteCards: 🗑️ Fix issue where cards remain visible after batch deletion
changelog.improveBatchDeleteSync: 🔄 Improve card list synchronization after batch deletion
changelog.fixCardListRefresh: 🔄 Fix card list not updating after batch operations
changelog.fixCardIndexError: 🐛 Fix card deletion index error issue
changelog.fixDeleteWrongCard: 🚨 Fix critical issue of deleting wrong cards
changelog.improveDynamicIndex: 🔧 Improve dynamic index system for operation accuracy
changelog.optimizeThumbnailRefresh: ⚡ Optimize thumbnail refresh logic to avoid unnecessary reloading
changelog.fixClosureIndexIssue: 🔒 Fix closure index fixation causing operation errors
changelog.improveCardEventHandlers: 🎛️ Improve all card event handlers to use dynamic indexing
changelog.enhanceDeleteReliability: 🛡️ Enhance deletion operation reliability and accuracy
changelog.addInstanceControl: 🎛️ Add instance mode control variable for easy single/multi-instance switching
changelog.improveWindowDisplay: ⚡ Optimize window display timing, reduce black screen wait time for new instances
changelog.enhanceFileFilter: 🔍 Enhance file filtering logic to avoid development environment parameter triggers
changelog.unifyInstanceLogic: 🔄 Unify instance management logic for more stable switching experience
changelog.enableMultiInstance: 🪟 Enable multi-instance mode, each video file opens in independent window
changelog.commentSingleInstance: 💬 Preserve single-instance code as comments for future mode switching
changelog.improveInstanceManagement: ⚙️ Improve instance management logic for better user experience
changelog.fixInstanceSyntax: 🔧 Fix syntax errors during instance mode switching
changelog.addWarpEditor: ✨ Add 8-point warp editor with free-form shape transformation
changelog.addWarpWindow: 🪟 Add independent warp editing window to avoid system conflicts
changelog.fixWarpTransformPreservation: 🐛 Fix wheel scaling overriding warp effects, ensure persistent warp state
changelog.improveWarpUI: 🎨 Improve warp editor interface with unified visual design
changelog.addWarpTransformManager: 🔧 Add warp transform manager for intelligent transform combination
changelog.fixWarpImageSizing: 🐛 Fix warp editor image sizing issues, maintain original aspect ratio
changelog.addWarpControls: 🎮 Add warp control buttons: reset, cancel, apply transform
changelog.integrateMoveable: 🔗 Integrate Moveable.js library for professional 8-point warping
changelog.fixScaleDataRetrieval: 🐛 Fix incorrect scale data retrieval in cards, now correctly displays actual scaling ratio
changelog.unifyUpdateCardsFormat: 🔧 Unify update-cards event data format across all files for consistent data transmission
changelog.addExistingCardsUpdate: ✨ Add existing cards data update mechanism to ensure real-time sync of scale and other properties
changelog.fixAltClickScaleUpdate: 🐛 Fix issue where card scale values weren't updated after Alt+click fit-to-screen
changelog.optimizeScaleSync: ⚡ Optimize scale synchronization mechanism for better data consistency between main and cards windows
changelog.fixCardsDataListener: 🔧 Fix cards window event listeners to ensure proper handling of data forwarded from main process
changelog.fixDragDropInterference: 🐛 Fix incorrect dropzone display and duplicate media addition during card dragging
changelog.improveDragDetection: ⚡ Improve drag event detection mechanism to correctly distinguish internal dragging from external file drops
changelog.fixCtrlClickZIndexUpdate: 🔧 Fix Ctrl+left-click z-index update issue, directly move corresponding card to bottom of list
changelog.fixScaleUpdateIndexMismatch: 🐛 Fix scale update index mismatch issue, use video source path instead of array index to identify target card
changelog.improveZIndexDetection: ⚡ Improve Z-Index detection logic, automatically identify highest layer element and move to correct position
changelog.enhanceCardsSyncMechanism: 🔄 Enhance cards window sync mechanism, add video source path matching and fallback index support
changelog.addDetailedDebugging: 🔍 Add detailed debugging logs for diagnosing Z-Index and scale update issues
changelog.fixAltClickScaleSync: 🔧 Fix Alt+left-click fit-to-screen scale input box not updating in cards window
changelog.addAltClickScaleNotification: 📢 Add Alt+left-click scale notification mechanism to ensure real-time scale value sync in cards window
changelog.unifyScaleUpdateMechanism: 🔄 Unify all scale update mechanisms using video source path identification for accuracy
changelog.improveAltClickDebugging: 🔍 Enhance Alt+left-click operation debugging information for tracking scale update process
changelog.addZIndexApplyButton: ✅ Add apply current order to Z-Index button for one-click card visual order application
changelog.improveCardsDragDrop: 🔧 Improve card drag-and-drop sorting functionality, fix drag-to-top position detection issues
changelog.enhanceDragDetection: 🔍 Enhance drag detection logic with detailed debugging information and position calculation optimization
changelog.addZIndexManualControl: 🎛️ Add manual Z-Index control options, providing both drag and button sorting methods
changelog.optimizeDragOverLogic: ⚡ Optimize dragover event handling logic to ensure elements move correctly to target positions
changelog.addVersionUpdateSystem: 🔄 Add version update system with automatic check, download and install latest version
changelog.addVersionUpdateUI: ✨ Add modern version update interface with progress display and multiple states
changelog.addGitHubAPIIntegration: 🔗 Integrate GitHub API for automatic latest version info and download link retrieval
changelog.addDownloadProgressTracking: 📊 Add real-time download progress tracking with circular progress bar and speed display
changelog.addSmartFileHandling: 🛡️ Smart file handling mechanism to avoid filename conflicts and download process locking
changelog.addVersionComparison: 🔍 Add version comparison logic with BETA version suffix support
changelog.addMultiLanguageUpdater: 🌐 Version update system supports multiple languages (Traditional Chinese, English)
changelog.addAutoInstallDetection: 🔍 Automatically detect downloaded installation files to avoid duplicate downloads
changelog.fixWindowParentRelation: 🐛 Fix version update window parent-child relationship with main window for synchronized closing
changelog.addDraggableUpdateWindow: 🎨 Version update window supports dragging functionality for improved user experience
changelog.fixWarpEditorMatrixCalculation: 🐛 Fix Warp Editor matrix calculation issue, resolve entire image movement when dragging single control point
changelog.optimizeWrapperSizing: ⚡ Optimize wrapper sizing calculation logic, directly calculate correct display size during creation
changelog.improveMediaElementLayout: 🔧 Improve media element layout using auto sizing and flexbox centering for accurate transform calculations
changelog.unifyWarpTransformBehavior: 🔄 Unify warp transform behavior between main window and Warp Editor for consistent matrix3d calculations
changelog.removeComplexCoordinateConversion: 🧹 Remove complex coordinate conversion logic, adopt pre-calculated sizing approach for simplicity
changelog.enhanceWarpEditorAccuracy: 🎯 Significantly enhance Warp Editor transform accuracy, achieve pixel-perfect warp effects
changelog.addStreamPlaybackSupport: 🎬 Add direct playback feature, support real-time streaming without waiting for complete transcoding
changelog.addRealTimeStreamingOptions: ⚡ Add three streaming options: fast, high quality, GPU accelerated for different needs
changelog.addAutomaticPortDetection: 🔍 Automatic port detection (50000-59999), avoid port conflicts
changelog.addHLSStreamingSupport: 🚀 Support HLS streaming format, provide better network compatibility and mobile device support
changelog.addStreamProgressMonitoring: 📊 Add streaming progress monitoring, real-time display of FPS and transcoding speed
changelog.addStreamResourceManagement: 🧹 Smart streaming resource management, automatically cleanup idle connections and processes
changelog.fixNvidiaSurroundF11Issue: 🐛 Fix F11 fullscreen NVIDIA Surround 256MB VRAM limitation issue
changelog.optimizeUltraHighResolution: ⚡ Optimize GPU rendering for ultra-high resolution displays (NVIDIA Surround)
changelog.disableVizDisplayCompositor: 🔧 Disable VizDisplayCompositor to improve multi-screen configuration compatibility
changelog.optimizeTextureSize: 🎯 Limit maximum texture size to 4096 pixels to prevent VRAM overflow
changelog.disableGPUOptimizations: 🛡️ Disable certain GPU optimization features to improve NVIDIA Surround stability
changelog.addWebMAlphaTranscoding: ✨ Add WebM Alpha transcoding options with alpha channel preservation support
changelog.addMultipleWebMAlphaQualities: 🎚️ Add four WebM Alpha quality options: 2M, 4M, 8M, 16M for different needs
changelog.fixTranscodingOutputFormat: 🔧 Fix transcoding output format selection issue, now dynamically chooses correct format based on preset
changelog.improveFFmpegOptionsCompatibility: ⚡ Improve FFmpeg options compatibility, avoid applying MP4 options to WebM format
changelog.optimizeWebMAlphaEncoding: 🎛️ Optimize WebM Alpha encoding parameters, using VP8 encoder and Vorbis audio
changelog.supportTransparentVideoTranscoding: 🎭 Support transparent video transcoding, perfectly preserve alpha channel from MOV and other formats
changelog.unifyTransformManagement: 🔄 Unify transform management system, integrate scaling, rotation, and translation into wrapper transform
changelog.fixDraggingFrameSkipping: 🎮 Fix frame skipping during dragging, use translate instead of left/top for smooth dragging
changelog.improveAltClickCentering: 🎯 Improve Alt+left-click fit-to-screen functionality, fix centering calculation considering transform-origin
changelog.fixLayoutSaveLoad: 💾 Fix layout save and load issues, correctly handle translateX/translateY data
changelog.optimizeTransformOrder: ⚡ Optimize transform order to translate→scale→rotate, improve transform accuracy
changelog.enhancePositionConsistency: 🔧 Enhance position consistency, ensure elements appear at same position after save/load
changelog.addWebLiveStreamFeature: ✨ Add Web Live Stream feature with support for multiple streaming sources
changelog.addWebLiveStreamConfig: 🔧 Add live stream configuration window supporting OBS Virtual Camera, webcam, and custom URL
changelog.addLiveStreamTransformSupport: 🎛️ Add complete transform support for live streams including rotation, scaling, and z-index control
changelog.fixLiveStreamEventHandlers: 🐛 Fix live stream missing event handlers issue, now supports all standard operations
changelog.addLiveStreamCardIntegration: 🎯 Integrate live streams into card system for unified management and control
changelog.improveLiveStreamUI: 🎨 Improve live stream user interface with modern configuration experience
changelog.addLiveStreamAutoScaling: 📐 Add live stream auto-scaling feature with intelligent window size adaptation
changelog.enhanceLiveStreamCompatibility: 🌐 Enhance live stream compatibility supporting RTMP, HTTP, WebRTC and other protocols
changelog.addLiveStreamDebugging: 🔍 Add detailed live stream debugging with automatic video device detection
changelog.improveOBSDetection: 🎥 Improve OBS Virtual Camera detection logic with automatic identification and connection
changelog.enhanceErrorMessages: 💬 Enhance error message prompts with detailed troubleshooting guidance
changelog.addDeviceEnumeration: 📋 Add device enumeration feature to display all available video input devices
changelog.fixLiveStreamCompatibility: 🔧 Fix new computer Live Stream compatibility issues, improve device recognition
changelog.addStreamStatusMonitoring: 📊 Add stream status monitoring with real-time video track information display

warpEditor.title: Warp Editor
warpEditor.instructions: Drag the 8 control points to warp the image or video
warpEditor.tips: Tip: Create perspective, distortion and other professional effects

updater.title: Version Update
updater.checkingDesc: Please wait while we check for the latest version.
updater.latestVersion: You have the latest version of Visual Player.
updater.readyToInstall: The update has been downloaded and is ready to install.
updater.errorDesc: An error occurred while checking for updates.
